name: Panic Factory (germanjazzguy)
description:
26.10.2675

We found a different alien today. It is by far less aggressive than its predecessors, so we should not have a too hard time neutralizing it. Unfortunately, due to a malfunction, our basis'  central computer keeps generating energy spheres in the area. We do not know what our prisoner is capable of when it gets its hands on these.

~ Lieutenant T. Jeffords
